translations.Your CSV file must use a comma (\",\") a: Your CSV file must use a comma (",") as separator
translations.Users of this CSV file are unknown and c: Users of this CSV file are unknown and cannot be imported. Check the following users and repeat the process:
The file must be in CSV format.
translations.Email address %s is linked to multiple u: Email address %s is linked to multiple users. Impossible to know which user to choose.
translations.Create team folders with delegated manag: Create team folders with delegated management
translations.# Description\n\nWorkspace allows manage:
# Description

Workspace allows managers to :
- Create shared workspaces
- Delegate management of each workspace to users (workspace managers) in order for them to:
    - choose members
    - create groups
    - configure advanced permissions on workspace folders
- All through a simple unified interface, designed to simplify your users' experience and make them autonomous

It is necessary to install the Team folders app for the Workspace app to work.

# App configuration

Before using Workspace, you must configure the app, following these important steps:

- Limit the Workspace app to specific groups : in your "application management" administrator interface, limit the application to the following groups: "GeneralManager" and "WorkspacesManagers".

- Configure Team folders for Workspace:
    - In "Settings" > "Team folders" > "Group folder admin delegation" section, add the group "GeneralManager" to the **first** field, and the group "WorkspacesManagers" to the **second** field

If you are using a major version of Nextcloud lower than Nextcloud 25, please follow the instructions provided on [GitHub](https://github.com/arawa/workspace). 

For more information, please visit [our website](https://www.arawa.fr/solutions/produits-arawa/arawa-workspace-for-nextcloud/) (french content).

For more details, please go to the [admin documentation](https://github.com/arawa/workspace/blob/main/README.md#installation), or [user documentation](https://github.com/arawa/workspace/tree/main/docs/user-guide/from-3.X.X).

translations.Caution, users highlighted in red are no: Caution, users highlighted in red are not yet member of this workspace. They will be automatically added.
translations.You aren't allowed to access into this a: You aren't allowed to access into this application !
translations.Warning, after removal of group <b>{grou:
Warning, after removal of group {groupname}, its users will lose access to the {spacename} workspace, with the exception of:

- Workspace Managers (WM-{spacename})
- users who are members of Workspace groups (prefixed G-)
- users who are members of another Added Group
- users manually added from the Workspace {spacename}
translations.Please note that after deleting the {gro: Please note that after deleting the {groupname} group, its users will retain access to the {spacename} workspace
